name: Razor Strop
flavorText: Encompassing both form and function, this belt keeps your pants up and your blades sharp.
flavorTextHtml: Encompassing both form and function, this belt keeps your pants up and your blades sharp.

secondary.textHtml: Increases Gold and Health Pickup by [1 - 2] Yards.
secondary.text: Increases Gold and Health Pickup by [1 - 2] Yards.

secondary.textHtml: Picking up a Health Globe releases an explosion that deals 342% weapon damage as Fire to enemies within 20 yards. [300 - 400]%
